text: Lauren Cohan (born January 7, 1982) is a American British actress and model. == Acting Career == Cohan best known for her role as Maggie Greene on The Walking Dead (2011–present). She is also known for her recurring roles on the television series Supernatural (2007–2008), Chuck (2011) and The Vampire Diaries (2010–2012), and in the comedy movie Van Wilder: The Rise of Taj (2006), the psychological thriller The Boy (2016), and for her role in the DC Extended Universe as character Martha Wayne in Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice (2016). ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Models from New Jersey Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:British models Category:Actors from New Jersey
title: Lauren Cohan
